metadata.title: CVE-2020-36476 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS before 2.24.0 (and before 2.16.8 LTS and before 2.7.17 LTS). There is missing zeroization of plaintext buffers in mbedtls_ssl_read to erase unused application data from memory.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.9-0.1ubuntu1').
